titleInfo.title: Burke Marshall, Honorary Citizen of Nashville, Tennessee, 1963 December 07

mods.identifier: RG 3 4931 Burke Marshall honorary citizen Dec7 1963 002

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: Pictured: Burke Marshall (on left) presented with an Honorary Citizenship of Nashville, December 7th, 1963 by an unidentified dignitary. Marshall was an American lawyer and the head of the Civil Rights Division of the United States Department of Justice during the Civil Rights Era. He served as U. S. Assistant Attorney General, Civil Rights Division, Department of Justice, 1961-1965; Chairman, National Advisory Commission on Selective Service, 1966-1967. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.

titleInfo.title: Record Group 3 Metro Davidson County Photographer
